channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 洞察：随着美国出口管制的加强，中国押注开源芯片
item.description: When a Beijing-based military institute in September published a patent for a new high-performance chip, it offered a glimpse of China's bid to remake the half-trillion dollar global chip market and withstand U.S. sanctions.翻译:当一家总部位于北京的军事研究所9月份公布了一项新型高性能芯片的专利时，它让人们得以一睹中国重塑5万亿美元全球芯片市场并抵御美国制裁的努力。
item.author: Eduardo Baptista

item.title: 中国陷入困境、贴现风险之际，投资者纷纷涌入印度股市
item.description: India's $4 trillion stock market is pulling in billions of dollars of domestic and foreign money as investors flock to a fast-growing alternative to China, brushing aside risks around overpriced shares, upcoming elections and regulatory uncertainty.翻译:印度价值 4 万亿美元的股市正在吸引数十亿美元的国内外资金，投资者纷纷涌向中国以外的快速增长的替代市场，抛开股价过高、即将举行的选举和监管不确定性等风险。
item.author: Jaspreet Kalra, Jayshree Pyasi

item.title: 由于交易员撤回降息押注，亚洲股市暴跌
item.description: Asian shares fell on Monday and the dollar climbed after a robust U.S. jobs report dashed any expectations of a near-term interest rate cut from the Federal Reserve, while stocks in China stocks remained on the back foot on weak sentiment.翻译:亚洲股市周一下跌，美元上涨，因强劲的美国就业报告打破了美联储近期降息的预期，而中国股市因市场情绪疲软而继续处于不利地位。
item.author: Ankur Banerjee

item.title: 中国1月份服务业活动扩张放缓——财新PMI
item.description: China's services activity expanded at a slightly slower pace in January as new orders fell, a private-sector survey showed on Monday, suggesting a soft start for the world's No.2 economy amid tepid demand and a property slump.翻译:周一的一项私营部门调查显示，由于新订单下降，中国一月份服务业活动扩张速度略有放缓，这表明在需求不温不火和房地产低迷的情况下，世界第二大经济体出现软启动。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着美联储削减押注的消退，美元攀上新高
item.description: The dollar rose to an eight-week high against its major peers on Monday as traders clawed back bets for aggressive rate cuts by the Federal Reserve this year in view of a still-resilient U.S. economy.翻译:美元兑主要货币周一升至八周高位，鉴于美国经济仍具弹性，交易员收回了美联储今年大幅降息的押注。
item.author: Rae Wee

item.title: 中国监管机构批准梅赛德斯-奔驰与华晨宝马设立合资公司
item.description: China's market regulator approved a joint venture set up by Mercedes-Benz (China) Investment Limited and BMW Brilliance Automotive Ltd, the State Administration for Market Regulation said in a statement released on Sunday.翻译:国家市场监管总局在周日发布的一份声明中表示，中国市场监管机构批准了梅赛德斯-奔驰（中国）投资有限公司与华晨宝马汽车有限公司设立合资公司。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国官员敦促巴布亚新几内亚拒绝中国安全协议
item.description: A senior U.S. state department official urged Papua New Guinea(PNG) to turn down China's offer of a potential security pact, warning the Pacific nation that any security guarantee with Beijing comes with consequences and costs.翻译:美国国务院一名高级官员敦促巴布亚新几内亚拒绝中国提出的潜在安全协议，并警告这个太平洋国家，与北京的任何安全保证都会带来后果和成本。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国参议院公布价值1180亿美元的两党边境安全法案，向乌克兰和以色列提供援助
item.description: The U.S. Senate on Sunday unveiled a $118 billion bipartisan border security bill that would also provide aid to Ukraine and Israel following months of negotiations, but the measure faces an uncertain future amid opposition by Donald Trump and hardline Republicans.翻译:美国参议院周日公布了一项价值 1180 亿美元的两党边境安全法案，经过数月的谈判，该法案也将向乌克兰和以色列提供援助，但由于唐纳德·特朗普和强硬共和党人的反对，该措施面临不确定的未来。
item.author: Richard Cowan, Costas Pitas

item.title: 中国价格暴跌将一些出口商推向崩溃的边缘
item.description: Prolonged factory deflation is threatening the survival of smaller Chinese exporters.翻译:长期的工厂通缩正在威胁中国小型出口商的生存。
item.author: Ellen Zhang, Marius Zaharia

item.title: 独家：卫材预计在中国推出 1,500 名阿尔茨海默氏症患者，预计增长“巨大”
item.description: Japan’s Eisai aims to roll out its groundbreaking Alzheimer’s drug Leqembi to 1,500 people in China later this year, but expects growth to accelerate significantly in 2025 as diagnosis methods change, a company spokesperson told Reuters.翻译:日本卫材公司发言人告诉路透社，该公司计划今年晚些时候向中国 1,500 名患者推出其突破性阿尔茨海默氏症药物 Leqembi，但预计随着诊断方法的改变，增长将在 2025 年大幅加速。
item.author: Julie Steenhuysen, Andrew Silver

item.title: 早盘竞价：美国乐观情绪与中国悲观情绪之间的斗争
item.description: If Asian markets take their cue from Wall Street, expect a burst higher. China? Not so much.翻译:如果亚洲市场受到华尔街的启发，预计会大幅走高。中国？没那么多。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 特朗普称美国需要对中国征收关税
item.description: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said he would impose tariffs on China again if he is elected in November and they could exceed 60 percent.翻译:共和党总统候选人唐纳德·特朗普表示，如果他在11月当选，他将再次对中国征收关税，关税可能超过60%。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 梅西错过迈阿密的香港友谊赛，因为组织者面临政府资金削减
item.description: Lionel Messi's three days of adulation in Hong Kong ended in heartbreak for his fans as the Argentine did not take to the field in Inter Miami's 4-1 win against a local League XI in a friendly played in front of a sellout crowd on Sunday.翻译:莱昂内尔·梅西在香港三天的崇拜以令他的球迷心碎而告终，因为阿根廷人没有参加迈阿密国际队周日4-1战胜当地联赛十一队的友谊赛，这场友谊赛在座无虚席的观众面前进行。
item.author: Joyce Zhou, Edmond Ng

item.title: 股市暴跌，中国人把美国大使馆变成“哭墙”
item.description: Many Chinese are venting their frustration at the slowing economy and the weak stock market in an unconventional place: the social media account of the U.S. Embassy in Beijing.翻译:许多中国人在一个非常规的地方发泄对经济放缓和股市疲软的不满：美国驻北京大使馆的社交媒体账户。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国药明康德表示，它不应成为美国生物技术法案草案中的“关注公司”
item.description: China's WuXi AppTec said on Sunday it has no affiliation with any governments or their military organisations, and it should not be listed as a "biotechnology company of concern" in a draft U.S. bill.翻译:中国药明康德周日表示，该公司与任何政府或其军事组织没有任何隶属关系，不应在美国法案草案中将其列为“值得关注的生物技术公司”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 富士康预计 2024 年会“稍微好一点”，警告人工智能芯片短缺
item.description: Taiwan's Foxconn , Apple's biggest iPhone assembler and the world's largest contract electronics maker, expects its business this year to be "slightly better" than last year but is facing a shortage of chips for AI servers.翻译:苹果最大的iPhone组装商和全球最大的电子产品代工商台湾富士康预计今年的业务将比去年“略好”，但面临人工智能服务器芯片短缺的问题。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国碧桂园称30多个项目得到地方政府支持
item.description: Cash-strapped developer Country Garden said on Saturday more than 30 of its projects had been listed by Chinese local governments as suitable for financing support, as authorities aim to inject liquidity into the crisis-hit sector.翻译:资金短缺的开发商碧桂园周六表示，其30多个项目已被中国地方政府列为适合融资支持的项目，当局旨在向受危机打击的行业注入流动性。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 印度将于五月前用文职人员取代驻马尔代夫的军队
item.description: India will remove its troops in the Maldives by May, the Maldivian Foreign Ministry said on Saturday, as the two countries seek agreement on a pullout that has strained ties.翻译:马尔代夫外交部周六表示，印度将在五月前从马尔代夫撤军，两国正在寻求就撤军达成协议，这导致两国关系紧张。
item.author: Krishn Kaushik, Mohamed Junayd

item.title: 中国芯片制造商长江存储在五角大楼名单后表示其技术不用于军事用途
item.description: China's top memory chip maker YMTC said on Saturday its technology is not for military use after it was added to a Pentagon list of entities assisting China's military.翻译:中国最大的存储芯片制造商长江存储周六表示，在被添加到五角大楼协助中国军方的实体名单后，其技术不用于军事用途。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着商业任务的步伐加快，中国发射了捷龙三号火箭
item.description: A small but powerful Chinese rocket capable of carrying payloads at competitive costs delivered nine satellites into orbit on Saturday, Chinese state media reported, in what is gearing up to be another busy year for Chinese commercial launches.翻译:据中国官方媒体报道，一枚小型但强大的中国火箭能够以具有竞争力的成本运载有效载荷，周六将九颗卫星送入轨道，中国商业发射即将迎来又一个忙碌的一年。
item.author: Ryan Woo
